repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: J. Walter Thompson Company. Charles J. Balestrino papers
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Founded in 1864, the J. Walter Thompson Company (JWT) is one of the oldest and largest enduring advertising agencies in the United States. Charles J. Balestrino was an executive, primarily in account management, at JWT offices in New York, Detroit, San Francisco and Tokyo. The JWT Charles J. Balestrino Papers span the years 1986-1994 and include correspondence, presentations, photographs, and videocassettes that document the later years of Balestrino's career at JWT's New York Office. Correspondents include Burt Manning, John Furr and Bill Thompson. Clients represented in the collection include Esso/Exxon, Goodyear, IBM, and Northwest Airlines. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: However, original audiovisual materials are closed to use. Use of these materials may require production of listening or viewing copies. Please contact Research Services before coming to use this collection.
Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], J. Walter Thompson Company. Charles J. Balestrino Papers, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The J. Walter Thompson Company. Charles J. Balestrino Papers were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a transfer in 1994.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accession 1994-0105 is described in this finding aid.

Senior Vice President, JWT San Francisco
Elected to JWT Board of Directors
Management Director, Ford Division account, JWT Detroit
Executive Vice President and General Manager, JWT Detroit
Executive Vice President and Director, JWT New York

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The JWT Charles J. Balestrino Papers span the years 1986-1994 and include correspondence, presentations, photographs, and videocassettes that document the later years of Balestrino's career at JWT's New York Office. Correspondents include Burt Manning, John Furr and Bill Thompson. Clients represented in the collection include Esso/Exxon, Goodyear, IBM, and Northwest Airlines.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged into the following series: Account Files, Office Files, Personal Files and Audiovisual Materials. Original folder titles have been maintained where possible. Arranged alphabetically.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Restrictions on Access: Original audiovisual materials are closed to researchers until a use copy can be produced.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found in the following Hartman Center collections of the J. Walter Thompson Company Archives:
